Text: Excellent! So good you kept the extras. The people "in the scene" have not a clue about quality of a rip. The rules are not even updated to reflect latest "perfect compression" techniques. I must say it the Poirot way: You are a man of perfection!
I feel that to study a film you should at least have the commentaries, they are like taking a lecture from someone already expert on the topic.
